alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:35PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cass and central Crow Wing Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1135 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pequot Lakes, to near Staples Airport, to near Verndale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gull Lake around 1145 PM CDT. Pequot Lakes around 1150 PM CDT. Nisswa around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pillager, Merrifield, Baxter and Ironton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central and east central Minnesota.
